verbose_text: Subsequently, the effect of bufalin on the phosphorylation of Smad2 and Smad3 was further examined after A549 cells were treated for 24 h. Western blot analysis demonstrated that bufalin inhibited the phosphorylation of Smad2 and Smad3 activated by TGF-beta after incubation with bufalin for 24 h, while their total protein levels remained unchanged (XREF_FIG).
evidence: phosphorylation of Smad2 and Smad3 was further examined after A549
